mapper.select: SELECT a.spSeq ,a.spName ,a.spStart ,a.spEatNy ,a.spRentalNy ,a.spRemain ,a.spPrice ,d.ptName ,d.ptAddress FROM ship a LEFT JOIN port d ON a.port_ptSeq = d.ptSeq WHERE 1=1 AND a.spSeq = #{spSeq}

SELECT g.odSeq ,g.odCount ,g.odTotalPrice ,g.odReturnNy ,g.odRegDate ,g.ship_spSeq ,g.member_mmSeq ,a.spName ,a.spStart FROM orders g LEFT JOIN ship a ON g.ship_spSeq = a.spSeq WHERE 1=1 AND g.member_mmSeq = #{member_mmSeq} AND g.odReturnNy = 0
mapper.update: UPDATE orders SET odReturnNy = 1 WHERE 1=1 AND odSeq = #{odSeq}
